name: Tower of Hanoi - Smol Ame Edition
name_original: Tower of Hanoi - Smol Ame Edition
description:
A game of Tower of Hanoi with a twist.

This is a fan game and I am not affiliated with Hololive Corp.

This one would be my very first game publish so I hope you guys enjoy it. Still planning to add more features soon specially an android version.

Credits:

Smol Ame 3D model - SeafoamBoi

2D Characters - Walfieee

Music: "Omocha no Dansu" ("Dance of toys") by Sumochi

- Played by Tagi Ruminae - Tagi_V

Feedbacks and Suggestions are well appreciated!
